blitz.name: Riftwalker
blitz.description: Riftwalkers bend time and become stronger as fights drag on. (Mobility, Stack Damage)
blitz.shortDescription: Bend time and ramp up

priest.name: Light Bender
priest.description: Light Benders support allies and become stronger as they heal. (Support, Buffs)

arcane.name: Arcanist
arcane.description: Arcanists cause destructive damage and chaos. (Burst Damage, Mana)

meteor.name: Meteor
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Summons a slow but powerful meteor
from the sky, dealing massive
damage over a large area.
 Mana Cost: 50
 Total Damage: 400% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 330%)
( Earth: 70%)
 Range: 18 Blocks
 Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

wandProficiency.name: Wand Proficiency I
description: Improve your Main Attack's damage
and range when using a wand.
 Main Attack Damage: +5%
 Main Attack Range: +2 Blocks

description: Reduce the mana cost of Meteor.
 Mana Cost: -10

shootingStar.name: Shooting Star
description: speed of your Meteor ability.

description: Improve your Main Attack's damage
and range when using a wand.

 Main Attack Range: +2 Blocks

teleport.name: Teleport
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT
 Mana Cost: 25
 Range: 16 Blocks

wisdom.name: Wisdom
description: For every 2% or 2 Raw Spell Damage you have
from items, gain +1/5s Mana Regen (Max 5/5s)
- Wand Proficiency II

heal.name: Heal
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT
Heals you and nearby allies in
a large area around you.
(When healing others, you can't heal
more than 30% of their max health)
 Mana Cost: 35
 Total Heal: 15% (of your max health)
 Range: 5 Blocks

teleportCost1.name: Cheaper Teleport
description: Reduce the mana cost of Teleport.
 Mana Cost: -5

icesnake.name: Ice Snake
description: Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Summons a fast-moving ice snake that
 Mana Cost: 30
 Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 70%)
( Water: 30%)
 Range: 18 Blocks
 Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Effect: 40% Slowness () to Enemies
 Duration: 3s

mageAirPath.name: Air Mastery
description:  Air Damage: +3-4
 Air Damage: +15%

mageThunderPath.name: Thunder Mastery
description:  Thunder Damage: +1-8
 Thunder Damage: +10%

mageFirePath.name: Fire Mastery
description:  Fire Damage: +3-5
 Fire Damage: +15%

mageEarthPath.name: Earth Mastery

 Earth Damage: +20%

mageWaterPath.name: Water Mastery
description:  Water Damage: +2-4
 Water Damage: +15%
Light Bender Archetype

windSlash.name: Wind Slash
description: When using Teleport, slash through the
air and deal damage to enemies you pierce.
 Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 75%)
( Air: 25%)
 Area of Effect: 1.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
description: After casting Meteor, summon 3 lightning
strikes and deal additional damage.
 Total Damage: +45% (of your DPS, per strike)
( Damage: +30%)
( Thunder: +15%)
 Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

burningSigil.name: Burning Sigil
description: Meteor and Ophanim will leave a sigil of fire
on the ground that damages enemies every 0.4s.
 Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 25%)
( Fire: 15%)
 Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
 Duration: 8s
 Cooldown: 8s

sunshower.name: Sunshower
description: Heal emits a strong light,
Arcane Transfer will damage nearby
enemies when transferring 30+ Mana.
 Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 70%)
( Water: 30%)
Light Bender Archetype

meteorDamage1.name: Stronger Meteor
description: Increase the damage of Meteor.
 Total Damage: +120% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +90%)
( Earth: +30%)
Min Arcanist Archetype: 2

windSweeper.name: Windsweeper
description: Your Main Attack will add +1 Winded ≈
to enemies you hit. (Max 10, 0.2s Cooldown)
Ice Snake will deal additional damage to
enemies for every Winded ≈ they have.
Winded ≈ will decay once every 5s.
 Total Damage: 15% (of your DPS, per Winded)
( Damage: 10%)
( Water: 5%)
Required Ability: Ice Snake
Min Riftwalker Archetype: 3

ophanim.name: Ophanim
description: When casting Meteor, instead summon
2 orbs of light with 200 Health that will
attack when you use your Main Attack.
When they damage an enemy, they lose 20%
of their Health. They can be healed back.
 Mana Cost: +30
 Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
( Damage: 90%)
( Water: 15%)
( Thunder: 15%)
 Range: 22 Blocks
Light Bender Archetype
Min Light Bender Archetype: 2

arcaneTransfer.name: Arcane Transfer
description: Meteor, Ice Snake, and Wind Slash will add +7 Mana to
a Mana Bank ✺ for every aggressive enemy you hit.
Heal will now transfer the contents of your
Mana Bank ✺ into usable Mana instead of healing.
Min Arcanist Archetype: 2

healCost1.name: Cheaper Heal
description: Reduce the mana cost of Heal.
 Mana Cost: -5

purification.name: Purification
description: Heal and Arcane Transfer will purify
allies of all negative effects and fire.
 Cooldown: 3s

seekingsnake.name: Sentient Snake
description: Ice Snake will follow the direction

 Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS)
( Damage: +20%)
( Water: +10%)

description: Teleport will blind enemies, confusing

 Effect: Blindness () to Enemies

breathless.name: Breathless
description: Meteor and Ophanim will deal additional damage
